attributes.action: Sunday trade hours-Bring back the day off.
attributes.additional_details: We should bring back our Sunday as a day off. Not based on any religious grounds, Just so that people can have a family day off or just time to ourselfs. In the UK we have lost our way a bit with shopping at all hours, let us regulate the Sunday laws, so we can have more of a family life and stop the greedy retail world pushing the boundaries.
